trivia_items.text: Her name is derived from the eponymous gemstone. In ancient Egypt, it was used as a decoration for scarabs.
Just like her sister, she has the traits of an argali (Ovis ammon), which can be seen from the shape of her horns and confirmed by its scientific name printed on her jacket.
The encarved patterns on her sword resemble Egyptian hieroglyphs.
Carnelian is the only Leithanian Operator who is not native to the country (she was born in Sargon).
Despite possessing a sword in her artworks and sprite (even unsheathing said sword during her skills), Carnelian does not use it in any of her attacks.

Excluding alternate Operators, Carnelian and Beeswax are one of the two pairs of Operators who shares the same illustrator and Japanese voice actress (in this case, they are both illustrated by カワグチ and voiced by Eri Kitamura). The other pair of Operators with this distinction is Blue Poison and Dobermann.
sub_items: Of both, Carnelian and Beeswax are the only ones who are blood related, near-identical in appearance, and share the same operator class and subclass.
